description: This file defines a RecyclerView adapter called RestaurantAdapter for displaying a list of restaurants in an Android application. It manages view creation, data binding, and item differences for efficient updates.

classes.name: RestaurantAdapter
classes.description: RecyclerView ListAdapter for Restaurant objects, handles view creation, data binding, and item comparison.

classes.name: Diff
classes.description: DiffUtil.ItemCallback implementation for providing item comparison logic.

classes.name: VH
classes.description: ViewHolder class holding references to views for a restaurant item.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates and returns a new ViewHolder by inflating item_restaurant layout.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds restaurant data to the ViewHolder views, including setting text, background color, and click listener.
